statements: DELETE FROM stem_cell_research_protocols WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM stem_cell_research_protocols WHERE protocol_id = 1 AND researcher_name = 'John Doe'
DELETE FROM stem_cell_research_protocols WHERE research_facility = 'Medical Research Center' AND research_date < '2021-10-01'
DELETE FROM compliance_reports WHERE reviewer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM compliance_reports WHERE submission_date < '2022-01-01' AND compliance_status = 'Not Compliant';
DELETE FROM compliance_reports WHERE report_date >= '2021-06-15' AND compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant';
DELETE FROM research_protocols WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe';
